apis.description:
### What will i learn? 
 * HTML 
 * CSS 
 * JS (BASIC) 
 * Adobe Photoshop (option) 
 * Adobe Illustrator (option) 
 * Adobe Xd (option) 
 * [Build Instagram Redesign](https://sanlinhtik3.github.io/ig-redesign/) 
 ### Who is the target audience? 
 * Anyone who wants to learn to create websites, be it beginner or intermediate programmer. 
 * If you want to start your carrier as a frontend web developer, HTML is a must alone with other technologies. 
 * If you wnat to make beautiful and responsive website, then this course is a must. 
 ### Benefits 
 * HTML is fun to write and easy to get started with, no need to set up compiler or the environment. 
 * Nowadays every business, be it small or large needs a website, so there is a lot of opportunity for a web developer 
 ### Requirement 
 * You won't need to know anything before taking this course 
 * Eagerness to learn, and make awesome website 
 * Nothing else it's just you, your computer and your hunger to get started today.

### About Course 
 á€á€„á€ºá€á€”á€ºá€¸á€…á€¬á€•á€±á€«á€„á€ºá€¸ 86 á€•á€¯á€’á€ºá€•á€«á€á€„á€ºá€•á€¼á€®á€¸ á€¡á€á€”á€ºá€¸á€¡á€•á€ºá€á€²á€·á€¡á€á€« HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Github, Ai, Ps, Xd á€á€­á€¯á€·á€€á€­á€¯á€•á€« Gift á€¡á€”á€±á€”á€¾á€„á€ºá€·á€›á€›á€¾á€­á€™á€¾á€¬á€–á€¼á€…á€ºá€•á€«á€á€šá€ºá‹ á€¡á€á€”á€ºá€¸á€¡á€•á€ºá€™á€Šá€ºá€†á€­á€¯á€•á€«á€€ [Messenger](https://m.me/inficreax) á€™á€¾á€¬ `FWD` á€œá€­á€¯á€·á€•á€±á€¸á€•á€­á€¯á€·á€•á€¼á€®á€¸ á€¡á€á€”á€ºá€¸á€¡á€•á€ºá€”á€­á€¯á€„á€ºá€•á€«á€á€šá€ºá‹ 
 ### This course includes: 
 * â° 120 hours on-demand video 
 * ğŸ“‚ 86 downloadable resources

 ### What will i learn? 
 * Guide 1: Introduction 
 * Guide 2: CSS Components 
 * Guide 3: JavaScript Components 
 * Guide 4: Layouts 
 * Guide 5: Utilities 
 * Guide 6: Icons 
 * [Guide 7: Portfolio Project](https://dh-b5.netlify.app) 
 * [Guide 9: Admin Dashboard](https://dh-admin-dashboard.netlify.app) 
 * Guide 9: How to get Certificate 
 ### Who is the target audience? 
 * Anyone who wants to learn to create websites, be it beginner or intermediate programmer. 
 * If you want to start your carrier as a frontend web developer, HTML is a must alone with other technologies. 
 * If you wnat to make beautiful and responsive website, then this course is a must. 
 ### Benefits 
 * HTML is fun to write and easy to get started with, no need to set up compiler or the environment. 
 * Nowadays every business, be it small or large needs a website, so there is a lot of opportunity for a web developer 
 ### Requirement 
 * You won't need to know anything before taking this course 
 * Eagerness to learn, and make awesome website 
 * Nothing else it's just you, your computer and your hunger to get started today.
